definition: to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

sentences.english: Chinese textual analysis is an artistic device to express efficient message.
sentences.chinese: 辭章是有效地表達話語信息的藝術形式。

sentences.english: All that can be done with words is soon told.
sentences.chinese: 在辭章上能做的工夫也就這些了。
